components.name: Application Gateway
components.description: Acts as a reverse proxy to manage incoming traffic and distribute it to backend services.

components.name: Web App Firewall
components.description: Provides protection against common web vulnerabilities.

components.name: Load Balancers
components.description: Distributes incoming traffic across multiple instances of the web application for improved availability and performance.

data_flows.description: Users initiate requests that are resolved through DNS to the Application Gateway.
The gateway forwards requests to the Web App Firewall for filtering.
Filtered traffic is sent to Load Balancers for distribution to the Web App.
The Web App interacts with the Azure SQL Database to store and retrieve data.
Application performance data is sent to Application Insights for monitoring.

trust_boundaries.name: User Access Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary between end-users and the application infrastructure.

trust_boundaries.name: Data Storage Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Boundary protecting the database and its access.
